short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Previeweet is an awesome browser extension that provides Twitter users with in stream image previews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You will have a nice preview of the images uploaded by users, so you can expand the ones you are really interested in.

Supported services:

- Instagram
- Dribbble
- Twitter (pic.twitter.com)
- Photobucket
- Facebook
- Apple
- Yfrog
- Twitpic
- Twitvid
- Imgur

and many more!

Due to the twitter cache, you might need to clear the browser cache or press CTRL+R to make previeweet working.

Bugs? Questions? contact me on twitter:
http://twitter.com/giuseppegurgone
